• Design validation boards for product evaluation, together with silicon designers, validation engineers, and other hardware / software engineers.
• Analyze end user’s technical requirement and develop circuit schematics of hardware and evaluation platforms to demonstrate Marvell’s products for system applications.
• Board design may involve schematic design, component selection, signal integrity and power integrity, safety, reliability and so on.
• Review and support customer designs using Marvell’s products, to ensure satisfying application requirement.
• Conduct board bring-ups, testing and debug to confirm circuit designs.
• Write technical reports and application notes.
• Familiar with IEEE 802.
• 3 and optical module / AEC MSAs for datacenter applications.
